###Question 1: Fizz Buzz
```{r}
for (i in 1:100) {
  if (i %% 3 == 0 & i %% 5 == 0) {print("Fizz Buzz")}
  else if (i %% 3 == 0) {print("Fizz")}
  else if (i %% 5 == 0) {print("Buzz")}
  else print(i)
}
```
